name: To Be a Hero
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED.

You descend from a long line of the kingdom's most elite monster hunters, and you're ready to crush some monster skulls. With enough kills under your belt, you'll be able to join your predecessors in the monster-hunting hall of fame. If you want to succeed, you'll need skill, smarts, and a little bit of luck along the way. 

Any and all feedback is appreciated.
